website_summaries.verdict: A versatile serum, containing Marula oil, that's rich in  antioxidants to moisturize and reduce early signs of aging.
pros: Customers with oily or combination skin have found it to be especially effective for hydrating the T zone
cons: Only comes in one large, relatively pricey size

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have large pores even though my skin is drying with age. i started using this wonderful serum and my pores snap shut, and my skin has a look of shiny youth! I put moisturizer on top, I noticed the difference by day of 2 of using it and I will use it for the rest of my life. I am 66 years old. I love your product
customer_reviews.author: B. Jay

customer_reviews.title: I use this serum in the morning right after washing ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this serum in the morning right after washing my face and toning, then I finish the routine with moisturizer and sunscreen. The serum's texture is not greasy, it also absorbs into my skin quickly and does not feel thick under the spf. It's a basic serum to nourish my skin's barrier as it contains niacinamide. My skin is healthier and hyperpigmentation is less visible after 3 months of using it. Also, my skin is acne prone, oily combination, but this product does not cause any breakout to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of texture on my skin, also had a lot of scarring from acne on my cheeks and hyperpigmentation from threading the upper lip . This is literally the ONLY product that helped with every one of my skin issues! It plumps up your skin and just using it for a month gave me such shocking results! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Wajeeha Nasir

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my chronic cystic acne and it worked wonders in the first 24 hours of use! (Cysts were shrunk to half their size which normally would take at least a week) It is so gentle and soothing yet obviously powerful. I feel this product is made with quality ingredients that target my problem areas but in a gentle way, which is exactly what my sensitive skin needs.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Serious piling issues.
customer_reviews.text: My first serum and my first experience with product piling. I'm in my 40's so I thought it time to use more products, well maybe I should stick with less. I would blend a few drops on a freshly washed face, allow to completely dry and then add moisturizer. As I rubbed my face it felt like residue of some sort was balling up on my fingers; as if my face had not been cleaned. I continued using it, making sure may face was scrubbed prior, waiting longer to put on moisturizer. This lasted for 2 months and since I wasn't noticing any changes in my skin, other than losing a lot of product on my fingers, I tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Watson

customer_reviews.title: Give it time to work, it won’t happen over night.
customer_reviews.text: The Niacinamide serum really help clear my dark spots after experiencing a horrible acne breakout. I’ve never had acne before so imagine suffering from this as an adult. It does take time to work but if you stick with a regimen you’ll see improvement in due time. I also purchased the Glycolic Cleanser and I wasn’t disappointed at all. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: BURNS SKIN
customer_reviews.text: The first two weeks i used this product, i used it probably 3 times a week twice a day. I loved the product at first, felt super moisturizing, smelled good, and didnt feel like it was hurting my skin. The third week I noticed odd blotching near my mouth and now a rash has spread across my entire face. There are burn marks under my eyes, cheeks, and mouth. I highly dont reccomend on buying this product, waste of money and causes irritation. Cannot even use my mosturizer and face wash that i've been using for years because of the burns.
customer_reviews.author: olt2019

customer_reviews.title: Read my review
customer_reviews.text: I have contact dermatitis on and off since july. Don't know what's causing it. I can only use vanicream or cetaphil. It wasn't enough to moisturize. I love instanatural but had to stop using retinol or glycolic acid. I was hesitant to use niacinamide bec it has other ingredients. Bought it anyway and I used it with vanicream moisturizer. I was desperate! Very very happy waking up and saw my face. My skin doesn't feel dry, itchy, and tight. No rashes, redness, bumps nothing. My skin is verrrryyyy sensitive since July. This is the best thing!!! I'm not getting any free stuff from giving this review! Honest to goodness. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: mila

customer_reviews.title: If you love your face, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and the product is amazing. I’ve used it on the recommendation of my dermatologist, and my dark spots have faded to almost nothing. The texture of my skin is greatly improved, and it glows again. Will continue to purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cari L Buckowich

customer_reviews.title: Entire Line of products are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These products have been a lifesaver for my 43 year old skin. I have always suffered with acne - even went through 3 rounds of Accurane. As an adult I developed Milia and nothing I did would get rid of it. I began using the Face Wash, Toner and Face Serum and my skin has seriously NEVER looked better! Milia is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie L. Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Product formula has changed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I bought it a little over a year ago. The bottle I received a couple days ago looks the same but the product has a completely different texture and the rosemary makes it too strong for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L

customer_reviews.title: Did not help with age spots or sun damage at all.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this product did was keep my face moisturized. Which I really don’t need because I have oily skin anyway. I bought this to lighten dark spots from sun & aging, but after a month of use, didn’t help one bit. I included a picture- the circled area was the lightest spot I had & it did nothing to change the color of that, not even a little bit. Sadly disappointed in this purchase & returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for six months and have gotten so many compliments on my complexion. This is the ONLY change I have made to my skincare routine. I have eczema and rosacea and can not use any retinol, after some research, I found niaminicide. I apply it nightly after cleansing and before I add a moisturizing serum. My face feels amazing. I was starting to develop a dark spot which has lightened. Friends I have had for years have complimented my skin recently, and it is seriously because of this. It has a thicker, milky consistency and smells of rosemary. It absorbs quickly and has not irritated my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bee S.

customer_reviews.title: Less redness and irritation on acne
customer_reviews.text: I read niacinamide is good for tightening skin pores so thought I give it a try. I'm always on a hunt for new and improved skincare especially as I am aging. I have combination and sensitive skin with occasional hormonal breakouts. I've been using this daily since I received it. Recently I I've been having bad break outs. Since using this, I noticed my skin is less red and irritated especially my acne. It appears to have lighted the acne and scars a little too. It feels moisturizing and I love the lavender scent. I will continue to use it in my skincare regime.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a miracle worker, but it works! I used to have cystic acne on my face all the time. It would get worst during my periods, but once I started using this consistently, my acne sort of disappeared. It didn't make the scars and pot holes go away, but it sure did help a lot. I occasionally get it back when i stop using this for a month or more, but it's worth trying! It may just work for you and I've tried a lot of things - even a dermatologist. I sometimes use it on my back and shoulders for cystic acne, but its less effective.
customer_reviews.author: safiyyah

customer_reviews.title: Rashes and pimples everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not compatible with my skin. I completely had a breakout, and I have rashes on my all over my head (especially my T zone and nose)
customer_reviews.author: Andre Nepomuceno

customer_reviews.title: Great product for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my 18 years old sons pediatrician told us to use niacinamide serum for his acne scars. He doesn’t like to put anything on his face but he loved insta natural. It is very light and applies very easily. Absorbs quickly and it works. His skin already looks better within 2 weeks without being dry or irritated..I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hulya B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know how this stuff does it, but I swear my skin feels and looks healthier after a while of use. I use it after my toner in the AM and before my moisturizer and sunscreen. I alternate use with a vitamin c serum (Map Hippie). I used both one time, and it just felt too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Audi

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle! Try this out!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my second bottle! I have extremely sensitive skin and have to really think about trying out a new product on my face since I'm always scared of causing more damage to my face: dark spots, acne marks, pores, etc. Well, this product is amazing on my skin - it's like liquid magic! I've noticed a difference on my skin since the first time I used it. My face is now brighter, clear, acne marks have significantly diminished, moisturized, smooth... simply amazing. (I even recommended this to my mom).
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Salcido

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC!
customer_reviews.text: I had pretty severe eczema in eyebrows, upper lip and chin. I bought this for breakouts I was getting and it works for that but I was shocked that it totally cleared up the eczema. GONE! None of the expensive prescriptions the dermatologist prescribed were much help. I had already been using hyaleronic acid to keep the wrinkles at bay and it actually made the excema worse sonI avoided those areas. Apparently, with the combination of ingredients it was effective. (70yo)
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this August 28 2019 and applied some to my face around 11 AM. I noticed a difference immediately. Then at night, again in morning ..routine of wash with Cerave, use Instanatural no other product as my skin is oily enough. Put on the back of my hand in a streak to apply so after face application I rub the back of my hands on each other. Make it all count. It tightens pores, brightens skin tone and helps to fade those awful age spots. This product is proof that higher price is NOT synonymous with what works, cause this stuff works great! I will be a repeat customer☺
customer_reviews.author: Snarkyboomer

customer_reviews.title: Burnt My Skin!
customer_reviews.text: On the back of the bottle it states: 'Discontinue use if irritation or redness occurs'. Well this serum burnt my skin. Now I have to use Marula Oil to keep the burnt areas moisturized and and minimize the skin from the flaking. On paper the ingredients should not have caused an allergic reaction so I'm not sure what was in there to cause this outcome. Needless to say that I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1999

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to higher end serums
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for such a cheap price! I was taking b vitamins orally and noticed a difference and thought I’d try out a topical version— turns out the affect is even better at calming down redness from acne when applied topically rather than ingested. I keep going back to it despite trying higher end serums that seem like they absorb better but don’t have much of an after effect. I use this in the evening and just give it time to soak in. Only con is the dispenser, I would prefer a pump bottle instead of the dropper as it’s more sterile and comes out more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dalina

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for weeks and don't see anything different, don't bother
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: Goes on so beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Niacinamide is great for the skin, especially for mature skin. This particular formula is very moisturizing and absorbs quickly. This will always be a mainstay of my beauty routine, and this formula will be my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Binnie

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my face
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for what to put on acne scaring. I haven't been using this product for very long but I feel like it is helping. I definitely am still battling acne in my 30s and it seems like it is helping on my existing acne as well. I love using this serum in my morning and night skin care routine! I am also super obsessed with this brand. I have the Rose Water spray which is super bomb and a few other products.
customer_reviews.author: Westley W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Now irritates my skin because formula was changed :(
customer_reviews.text: Used this serum for years loving it because it got rid of acne and made skin glowing! Unfortunately they changed the formula and now it is burning my skin and leaves my face red and hurt! I read lavender was added! I’m very sensitive to lavender and it is irritating! Please change your formula back to how it used to be!! It was perfect before!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJAJ

customer_reviews.title: I wish I found this serum a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and am very acne prone especially during the lady time of the month. I also get these rough bumps on my face at night. Not really pimples but very aggravated. Literally as soon as put this serum on the bumps vanished. immediate relief! The cystic acne went away after the next day. Normally my pimples will linger at least a whole week after my menstruation. The smell alone is very calming and natural. I'm so happy I found this product and if you are struggling with skin issues I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Aleshchenko

customer_reviews.title: I use it with my other creams and it makes them work so much better. Also
customer_reviews.text: I have used two bottles of this. It has very helpful to my skin. Seems to reduce the darkness of my dark spots. Helps to moisturize my skin in a way no other skin care product alone has. I use it with my other creams and it makes them work so much better. Also, seems to have cut back on the number of skin cancers I have had.
customer_reviews.author: warm in Ky

customer_reviews.title: Maskne issues
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with maskne for the last couple of months, leaving me with very inflamed pimples around my jaw and cheeks. It has also left me with some hyperpigmentation on my cheeks as well. In the time I've used this, my face has gotten much better. I usually use it at night and when I wake up, the maskne is not as inflamed and angry as the night before. The scent isn't my favorite but it's not super strong. I also love that the serum is a little bit thicker as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products I have used
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me get rid of dark spots on my skin and reduced redness. I think it helps keep my face clear of acne too. I have had acne since I was about 12 and I continued to have issues in my mid twenties. My skin is the best it has been in my adult life. I have been using it for about a year and my skin still looks great. Great results for a super low price compared to other skin products that I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Serum for sensitive/acne/rosacea prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this serum in the morning under my make up and as night. It is lightweight and absorbs well. I have very sensitive rosacea prone skin and it does not cause flare ups. Also recommended for those with acne. InstaNatural never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Warner

customer_reviews.title: Very good for rosacea
customer_reviews.text: This is my first niacinamide product and I didn’t realize how much my rosacea-prone skin needed it. It significantly reduces the redness on my cheeks with regular use. A little goes a long way. Edit (8/26/20): I’ve just received my second order because it’s one of the few products that truly helps to calm my rosacea. I hope they never stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Smells amazing and works like a charm. In my late 30s I was sick of using teenage acne creams every night that stain my pillows. This product actually really works for controlling acne, and as a moisturizer. I use it twice a day and love it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT WILL RUIN YOUR FACE
customer_reviews.text: Bought the face wash with the serums and moisturizers based on the reviews. I have very good skin for my age, no blemishes, redness, discoloration etc. I used the products ONE TIME and now my face is red blotchy, itchy, it is horrible. It has been this way for an entire week! It is SLOWLY going away but whatever is in this I had a massive reaction to. The funny thing is my husband who NEVER is irritated with anything had the same result! Do not buy, please for the sake of your face. whatever is in these products it is not worth it! The savings are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for a little over a month so far, and have noticed my skin looking so fresh and good! I accidentally dropped my bottle and spilled a bunch out, so just ordered another bottle. This one should last a long time as I only use 3 drops morning and another 3 drops at night. My pores Appear smaller and my occasional acne has greatly improved! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Swady

customer_reviews.title: I actually use this and love it.
customer_reviews.text: I began using it about 3 weeks ago. My forehead (problem area) looks amazing. I have received compliments and people cannot pinpoint what they are complimenting. They just think it's makeup. I am stunned with the disappearance of old acne scars! They seem filled, as if I had a procedure. Also my skin is softer than it has ever been! Ever!
customer_reviews.author: fantaztika

customer_reviews.title: Great formula but the dropper broke
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely loved this formula. I have extremely oily skin, so thick serums tend to feel gross and heavy on my skin. This one has been amazing. Only issue is my dropper randomly broke and now I’m afraid to use the rest for fear of glass. It did break pretty clean all around, so maybe it was just a fluke. Figured I should share in case it’s a design error needing to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this serum as there were many positive reviews but i’m so disappointed! the quantity of bottle and the smell is very good but it had weird texture when i put it on my face and it awkwardly blend with other products and the thing that put me off is i had soo many bumps on my forehead on my 3rd day of using this bottle, i’ve had read review with similar complain...
customer_reviews.author: Lunas360

customer_reviews.title: Serums are important!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of serums, understanding that they are important. I started using this particular product due to its ingredients. Suffice it to say that I have a subscription now to this specific product because I do see the difference. I wish I had lavished as much care on my hands as I have on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great mattifying and moisturizing serum!
customer_reviews.text: I use this serum daily. It comes in a nice sturdy glass bottle with a "suction dropper" for super easy application. Just a couple dots dabbed evenly onto the skin gets the job done, so it lasts forever. I often use it sans moisturizer bc I am so happy with the mattifying effect. It has diminished dark spots on my face and noticeably firmed my skin. This is a staple in my skincare routine now!
customer_reviews.author: JenniLynnW

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin sticky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start a skin care routine. First toner I’ve ever had so I wasn’t sure what to expect. I have pretty normal skin so I wasn’t looking to improve anything. I didn’t feel any improvements. All that being said I don’t like using this product at all. It makes my skin feel really sticky at first and after it’s absorbed it leaves a weird film on my skin. I’ve been using it on and off for 4 months now (not consistently because again I hate how it makes my skin feel). The first month or so it definitely caused some acne
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve struggled with acne since I was a teenager and I’ve never found a moisturizer that kept my skin feeling hydrated all day without being oily or drying out by noon. This stuff really does the job. PLUS the red marks I’ve struggled with for years are fading overnight. I’ve been using this 3 days and the scarring I have and the uneven skin tone have been completely evening out. No new breakouts either. LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Was not good for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted desperately to like it but it was bad for my skin. Made me blotchy, red and itchy. I put it on and it's didn't soak in it was like a mask it would peel off quickly and didn't help my skin at all. It has a really strong flower chemical smell I didn't like and did burn.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Most everything breaks me out in painful cystic acne but to my surprise this did not. In the beginning, I noticed a few bumps but after regular use I have had no breakouts. This product was recommended on a blog post for curology so I decided to try it out. Will continue to purchase when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: khol

customer_reviews.title: Actually Worked
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a ton of tiny bumps across my forehead and they weren’t red or anything just bumpy and I would break out on my cheeks and chin too. I tried a lot of high rated products which didn’t do much except the Neutrogena Rapid Clear Acne Wash which totally got rid of the tiny bumps but i still had the occasional breakout until I started using this. Together my skin looks amazing and I haven’t had a breakout in months, I feel great about my skin and haven’t even worried or felt insecure about it for the first time in years. Would totally recommend and saw clearness super fast.
customer_reviews.author: dcfamily

customer_reviews.title: This product is superb!
customer_reviews.text: It smells great, it absorbs into the skin quickly, it's very light weight on the face, it moisturizes the skin, and the ingredients are great (niacinimide is so great). Its a product that is well worth the price. I have naturally oily skin that is acne prone so I cannot use too much of this because of the avocado oil and vitamin E but when I need an extra moisture surge this is my go-to. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy; does not absorb well
customer_reviews.text: I gave this serum a try for several days, but I don't like its texture. It's a bit too thick and heavy; it sits on my skin and does not absorb. So, even after several minutes, it feels sticky and tacky to the touch. I've tried using it alone, and tried adding my regular moisturizer over it after waiting a few minutes for it to absorb. Neither is a good solution.
customer_reviews.author: Janeway

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: For years I’ve struggled with moderate acne. I thought I’d grow out of it, but my 30th birthday rolled around and it was still a problem. I’ve tried all of the over-the-counter face washes and even prescription strength topical creams without any significant change. Then I had a revelation. Instead of trying to kill all the bad stuff, I should try to feed the good stuff. I now wash my face with CeraVe, apply this niacinamide cream, and moisturize. That’s it. My skin hasn’t been this good in almost 20 years. I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Wright

customer_reviews.title: so I don't know if I got a bad bottle or what
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all for my skin. It was very watery, so I don't know if I got a bad bottle or what, but I was very disappointed after reading so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is the best serum I've ever found for hyperpigmentation -- I am ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best serum I've ever found for hyperpigmentation -- I am always trying to fade post-acne marks, and this is amazing at evening my skintone and reducing overall redness. It's also really great for soothing stressed skin and boosting moisture. I travel a lot and this gets decanted into my travel kit every time I know I have a long flight since I know it'll will keep my skin clear and hydrated. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely moisturizing, but made me break out.
customer_reviews.text: So this product will work well for anyone with small pores. I unfortunately have enormous pores, so the comedogenic oils in this product gave me pimples. It's an experience I'm used to, and when I stopped using this on my whole face the breakout stopped. I still use it (very carefully!) around my eyes with nice results. I think it works better around my eyes because my pores are so much smaller in that area. On the plus side, it has a light lavender/herbal scent that I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: Steam clean face with hot washcloth, pat dry. Tone (I use witch hazel), air dry. Smooth this niacinamide serum all over face and neck. Use some pressure to rub in. Air dry. Apply eye gel and moisturizer. Apply sunscreen liberally. Follow up with mineral primer.
customer_reviews.author: EmZ

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, high benefit skin serum. Very good results for sensitive dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very soothing and hydrating for dry, sensitive skin. I am hoping that the niacinamide will help prevent a recurrence of skin cancer on my lip. Since I have been using it and taking an oral niacinamide supplement I have had no inklings of a return of the basal cell carcinoma. Before I began the regimen of oral and topical niacinamide I had begun to see the redness and flaking that had been a precursor of the cancer twice before. The serum is not promoted as a cancer preventative but if you research you will see that it has been found to reduce the recurrence of skin cancers.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing, fresh face serum
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and the feel of this product. I've been using it for a few months now, and I think my face is smoother. I like the subtle, fresh scent, and that there is no stickiness or drying feeling on my hands or face after I apply it. I've already bought another bottle, and believe I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: DebSings

customer_reviews.title: Heavily Fragranced - Very Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Definitely heavy lavender scent! It smells lovely, but didn't really react well with my skin and I believe that was part of the problem. Also was a heavy formula and took several hours to seem to "dry" down, although it never really lost it's tackiness.
customer_reviews.author: mz45

customer_reviews.title: Has lavender in it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to use this product since it has lavender oil in it and smells heavily of it. I wish this had been included in the product description, since most people like it but I am allergic to it. Otherwise, the product looked as described and arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Champ

customer_reviews.title: Natural ingredients that gets results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this serum for my 17 year old daughter after her dermatologist recommended she use Oley 7 in 1 cream to help with her breakouts. I looked up the ingredients for the Oley product and along with some good nutrients it was full of chemicals. She has been using this natural serum for a couple weeks and there is a noticeable decrease in breakouts and reduction in the dark spots from old breakout spots.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this product enough! I have acne prone, dry skin. This keeps me moisturized and glowy and does not break me out! My skin feels so smooth and hydrated. I use this morning and night, sometimes mixing in other oils or serums. Also, the smell! It's like skincare and aromatherapy- it's a lovely rosemary scent. Such great, quality ingredients; I really can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: magor

customer_reviews.title: Heavy scent, dangerous top!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this serum, it did not work for me. It has a very heavy scent of lavender and rosemary and made my skin break out every time I used it. It did seem to slightly help shrink pores but I'm going to find a niacinamide serum that doesn't have all the essential oils in it. Also the top of the eye dropper is dangerous! Where the silver colored top meets the bottom of the screw top, it was sharp and cut my finger open!
customer_reviews.author: DawnR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and pure products.  Love the smell of products as well, smells so fresh.
customer_reviews.text: Help with break-outs and moisturize skin. Love the products, purity, and smell of them. Just need to fix the lids a bit to make them not so sharp. Gave me a paper cut trying to open. Other than that, love the product. I have very sensitive skin that breaks out easily, so very grateful my skin is looking more clear and moisturized. This is not my 1st time to buy either, this is my second time to purchase. Thank you Renee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after seeing it on Lifehacker to help with persistent adult acne. While I am not always the best at skincare, this makes it seem like I am. My skin is clearer and looks great. The serum does make my skin feel a bit tacky to the touch but once I have applied moisturizer, the feeling is diminished. I plan to keep using it and try a few more of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Ficarella

customer_reviews.title: Great serum!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this! Has helped with my skin. I wouldn’t say that it gave me crazy results but I can tell my skin is tighter more moisturized and I haven’t gotten a lot of pimples. I also have sensitive skin and this had no reaction :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels & Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review as part of a rebate program. I have used this every night before bed for 3 days. My skin feels great. I can already see a bit of improvement in my dry areas around my eyes. Will update my review in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie M. Raygoza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this daily for a month and I LOVE IT! I'm 54 and have noticed it's starting to help improve the look of my skin, small wrinkles are gone. Large wrinkles look less deep. Can wear under make up. Nice light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Take nutrition right to the skin
customer_reviews.text: Clearing up some skin cancers on my face resulting from thousands of hours in the Calif. sun as a fire fighter, surfer, lifeguard, beach kid, this really seems to assist visibly in the final healing process. See also, the Youtube video, "World Without Cancer." Amazing results from Laetrile, Vitamin B17, Amygdalin, whatever you want to call it, found in bitter apricot kernels also available inexpensively on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: rico

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I'm not sure I notice a huge improvement, but there has been some positive changes. My face is definitely not as dry as it had been. I feel like I'm more comfortable without makeup on as I have less redness. I do have to be careful how much product I use before makeup (between this and my lotion) or I get some weird pilling residue sort of thing happening. I plan to order this again.
customer_reviews.author: M Fry

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Currently my favorite serum from InstaNatural! My skin is oily, acne prone and occasionally dry. I love the rosemary scent, which is surprising for me because I am not usually a fan. This serum leaves my skin soft and hydrated. It is a part of my night time routine. I am seeing results. I do believe it is helping a little bit with my hyperpigmentation, but I need a little more time to know for sure since I have only been using the product for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the pump!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about two years an it works great for my acne scars and fine lines. I hydrates my skin well and feels very soothing. However a while back the packaging changed and it looks pretty but it use to have a pump and now has a dropper. The dropper is messy and does not draw up enough priduct. Luckily I had a pump from another bottle that fits so I use that. Bring back the pump!
customer_reviews.author: ginger78

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels on my skin. I've been uning this for about a month now and am starting to see improvement on my dark/age spots. I will continue to use this and expect to see more positive results. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a little suspicious at first, but it actually worked really well! My skin is so much clearer than it used to be and I practically stopped wearing foundation (except for nicer events). I used to have mild outbreaks here and there, but now I can't even remember the last time I had a pimple. Been using this product for 3 months now and am so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a month in combination with the face wash, the collagen night cream, and the age defying and skin clearing serum. I had two very noticeable age spots in my left cheekbone. As you can see, it’s diminished significantly. In addition to that, the hydration of my skin and pores have changed drastically. I know the lighting is a little off but the difference is evident. I’ll definitely continue buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yuridia Colon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Serum will repurchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this serum in combination with their Glycolic Acid and the two have been amazing in helping me reduce my hyperpigmentation. This serum alone is heaven on earth. I apply this day and night and it just give my skin a beautiful glow, fills in my fine line and has noticeable reduced the size of my pores. My hyperpigmentation is also improving every day. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greenbeautyproject

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-aging serum
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this serum. It is lightweight enough I can combine it with my other beauty products and even my evening acne fighting medication. I use it mostly for its anti- aging benefits and have noticed improvements to my skin color and texture. Great product, I’m on my second bottle and will be coming back for more. I love that it comes in a glass container with a glass eye dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This niacinamide serum smells and acts identically (in my opinion) to another by Leora Beauty but the InstaNatural serum is half as expensive. I think it's a great value if you are looking for a serum like this - lasted a LONG time. This serum is awesome. At first, I didn't realize how great it worked but then I tried some other serums and my skin got dry and sort of broke out. After going back to this serum, my face was smooth and moisturized again after less than a week. It really improves the texture and quality of your skin. Also, this company has the best customer service in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It clears up my redness and breakouts quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I love the serum, it helps with redness and breakouts, almost over night sometimes. My skin texture is softer. It's light weight and dries with no residue, I can use moisturizer and foundation over it with out feeling heavy layers. I purchased the niacinamide serum in the beginning of the year and again in spring. Since only a few drops are required, and sometimes I just need a spot treatment ight lasts a little over a month. There is a very light fresh scent and the product doesn't lose consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: glowing after 15 days of use before bed!
customer_reviews.text: I find that my skin has become brighter. I'm in my late twenties and have had good skin years and bad skin years. The last 3 years have not been so hot due to stress of grad school/life. When I get anxious, I pick and fidget. I find that this product helps even out my skin tone, I use it at night after removing makeup and let it soak into my skin, then add some aquaphor to "lock" it in. I will take after photos soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my dark spots on my face and it seems to be working and it goes on so smooth. Will by it again, in the beginning it gave me a little irritation but I always do with anything I use sensitive skin now it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Milagros perez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying for moisture retainment
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and was only using the insta-natural face wash and insta-natural moisturizer for my daily routine. I didn't feel like the moisturizer was actually moisturizing my skin and it was recommended to me by a specialist to find myself a serum. I purchased this serum and since the first use, I have noticed my skin has been able to hold moisture in fo so much longer! It also smells glorious. I will never skip this step in my skin routine ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients for skin
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, thin, great smell, but overall and most important it has helped with my acne scars truly. Thank You for making such a great serum, with excellent ingredients for your customers!
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: The product is too thick for the squeeze tube that ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is too thick for the squeeze tube that you are suppose to use. I wrote them once about this and never heard back. I will never order this particular brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin!
customer_reviews.text: I use niacinamide primarily to even out my skin tone, and to help with inflammation and hyperpigmentation caused by mild acne. I apply this product underneath moisturizer, it's very light, not sticky or smelly, and a little product covers a lot of skin. The serum isn't a miracle worker, but on me it does speed up/ prevent dark spots from acne. It also seems to reduce oiliness, and improve appearance of larger pores.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E

customer_reviews.title: Careful with tightening the lid
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when closing the lid. Sliced my finger pretty deep twisting it shut. Filed it down to prevent again. Only used a few times so not sure yet if I love it. I notice that when I apply it with other skincare products it causes whites chunks (like glue) it's not dead skin so it must bind with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Cool guy fly

customer_reviews.title: Very runny.
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopefull this would be great due to the reviews but this serum is not great. it smells really nicee and it dint irritate my sensitive skin. i dont know if i just got a bad batch but it was basicly water in a bottle. i know its a serium but this was so runny the liquid would not even stay in the dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Kupins

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product with great ingredients. I wake up glowing everyday and I'm so happy my skin feels and looks wonderful. My scars are fading and my skin is moisturized. I would purchase again. Don't be scared try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing for my skin, at least not visually. Very disappointed that I missed the return window. Would not recommend, but hopefully I’m in the minority!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Younger looking skin
customer_reviews.text: This has made my skin supple, smooth and has decreased the hyperpigmentation. It has done wonders. I feel like my skin looks and feels more youthful.
customer_reviews.author: Shannie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing refuses to stay closed, which I am sure affects the quality. No wonder I don’t see results. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels bouncy, looks glowing, and dark spots are noticeably less visible.
customer_reviews.text: After using this product daily for the past 12 weeks, I my acne dark spots and scars are definitely faded. This makes an excellent moisturizer morning or night. I have acne prone skin and had no issues with this product. It was recommended to me by Curology. I am definitely a fan of InstaNatural now!
customer_reviews.author: Smita

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to address some unevenness in my skin tone and for the moisturizing benefits. It exceeded my expectations with evening out skin tone and I also have the unexpected benefits of decreased occurrences of acne and softening of fine lines. I was using twice a day morning and night but I have an oily skin type and I seemed to experience more oiliness during the day while using. If you have an oily skin type as well I suggest only using at night because its plenty moisturizing using only once a day. Otherwise this is a great product for the price and the customer service can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the instanaturals line!
customer_reviews.text: Since using this, (and other products) I have noticed my face become brighter and better looking. It’s color corrected, brightened and firmed my face. It’s worked so well that other people have been noting and mentioned it to me.
customer_reviews.author: BabyGiraffe

customer_reviews.title: Effective but texture issue
customer_reviews.text: This serum has a nice effect on dry skin. It has a lot of nourishing ingredients, and seems to help improve my skin's moisture content and vitality. The only issue is that it seems to go on weirdly, leaving white streaks behind. I have found that mixing it with a couple drops of jojoba oil helps to smooth it on nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Pure ingredients that make you glow!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing, it feels incredible, gives you an instant glow and best of all it’s made in the US from a small company who is striving for not only pure ingredients but honesty - which I love. First of many purchased. A forever customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan N. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin dry and peel
customer_reviews.text: Finished one bottle of this and really liked it. Not sure it improved my uneven skin and hyperpigmentation but it felt nice. However I just received my second bottle of this and after one use my entire face peeled over the next three days. My skin became extremely sensitive so I discontinued use of all products and only used moisturizer for about a week. I assumed it was something else since this I used an entire bottle of this without issue so I tried it again a week and a half later and again the next day face started peeling! Not sure what they changed but I will have to throw this away and won’t reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Results
customer_reviews.text: I was starting to get little Melia bumps on my face, tried a few things, but now with washing with a scrub first, then applying cream letting it dry, then putting collagen cream on my face at night it has done the trick, bumps almost all gone, thank you for such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark spots, don't use it as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great for brightening your skin and helping dark spots! I would also put a moisturizer on top of it because it can feel a little sticky if it's the last thing you put on your face. I love how it has natural ingredients which I think is always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Berket Beyene

customer_reviews.title: InstaNatural Niacinamide Vitamin B3 5% Serum
customer_reviews.text: I am most satisfied with InstaNatural's Niacinamide Vitamin B3 5% Serum! I just started using it, and it makes my skin feel wonderful! I don't use it everyday as I'm using other serums and was able to receive help as to how to rotate these serums for them to perform most effectively. I love the InstaNatural because it feels silky-smooth going on, it doesn't have any kind of odor, the bottle has a convenient pump, and the price is very reasonable (especially since it comes in a 2-ounce bottle). I think I'll stick with InstaNatural from now on! Try it -- you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: lovely formula
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, well packed and the product is very nice. I <3 the scent, it is not overpowering. The serum itself is lovely, gentle and sinks into my skin quickly with zero residue. I recommend this and purchased this after I ran out of another brand and am very happy with the product and the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell but it made me breakout... and it left a film on my face.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell but it made me breakout (I almost ever break out)... and it left a film on my face. I wanted a moisturizer that would soak in nicely. I would only use a light layer after washing my face but I could still feel a bit of residue/film.... So I'm not surprised it made me breakout. I really wanted it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: This company's products are high quality and work!
customer_reviews.text: Niacinamide is a must have to any beauty regimen. I use it as an anti aging serum along with all my other serums and before my oils or cream. My son also started using this in the past couple months and it has drastically decreased his acne. We will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simmons

product_meta.title: InstaNatural Niacinamide 5% Face Serum - Vitamin B3 Anti Aging Skin Moisturizer - Diminishes Acne, Breakouts, Wrinkles, Lines, Age Spots, Hyperpigmentation, Dark Spot Remover for Face - 2 oz
feature_bullets: FIGHT BREAKOUTS & HYPERPIGMENTATION - InstaNatural’s Niacinamide Facial Serum contains 5% Vitamin B3, which means it’s packed with natural, soothing properties that actively work to even your skin tone by addressing breakouts, blemishes, red marks and irritated skin. It also nourishes your skin to minimize redness or blotchiness while also working as a dark spot remover for face and diminishing the appearance of hyperpigmentation to give your skin a youthful glow you’re sure to love.

ADVANCED ANTI AGING SERUM FOR FACE - Introducing a Niacinamide Serum as a regular piece of any skin care regimen has been shown to reduce the appearance of the most common signs of aging on the skin, including those around the eye, mouth and forehead area.

FIRM & PLUMP SAGGING SKIN - With regular use of this anti wrinkle serum for face, you’ll see the appearance of your pores diminish while your skin regains a firm and plump glow. By supporting healthy elasticity in the skin, this Niacinamide serum fixes wrinkles, fine lines, sagginess and puffiness.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
